name: Minna no Shiiku Kyoushitsu: Kuwagata-hen
overview: Minna no Shiiku Kyoushitsu - Kuwagatahen (Raise Your Own Insect) let's the player to choose between 14 kinds of beetles and try to rise them from larvas to complete specimens, after choosing the beetle the player can choose if he wants to breed it on a terrarium or a jar, the kind of earth that he wants to use and also control the temperature, weight it, etc. The raised ones can be examinated after that in details in the picture book. The game also features a complete beetle encyclopedia with pictures and explanations.
